00019 namespace ldmx {
00020 
00021     void UserTrackingAction::PreUserTrackingAction(const G4Track* aTrack) {
00022 
00023         int trackID = aTrack->GetTrackID();
00024 
00025         if (trackMap_.contains(trackID)) {
00026             if (trackMap_.hasTrajectory(trackID)) {
00027                 // If this track has already been processed in this method,
00028                 // then make sure its trajectory does not get deleted!
00029                 fpTrackingManager->SetStoreTrajectory(true);
00030             }
00031         } else {
00032             // New track so call the process method.
00033             processTrack(aTrack);
00034         }
00035 
00036         // Activate user plugins.
00037         pluginManager_->preTracking(aTrack);
00038     }
00039 
00040     void UserTrackingAction::PostUserTrackingAction(const G4Track* aTrack) {
00041 
00042         // Activate user plugins.
00043         pluginManager_->postTracking(aTrack);
00044 
00045         // Save extra trajectories on tracks that were flagged for saving during event processing.
00046         if (dynamic_cast<UserTrackInformation*>(aTrack->GetUserInformation())->getSaveFlag()) {
00047             if (!trackMap_.hasTrajectory(aTrack->GetTrackID())) {
00048                 storeTrajectory(aTrack);
00049             }
00050         }
00051     }
00052 
00053     void UserTrackingAction::storeTrajectory(const G4Track* aTrack) {
00054 
00055         // Create a new trajectory for this track.
00056         fpTrackingManager->SetStoreTrajectory(true);
00057         Trajectory* traj = new Trajectory(aTrack);
00058         fpTrackingManager->SetTrajectory(traj);
00059 
00060         // Update the gen status from the primary particle.
00061         if (aTrack->GetDynamicParticle()->GetPrimaryParticle() != NULL) {
00062             G4VUserPrimaryParticleInformation* primaryInfo = aTrack->GetDynamicParticle()->GetPrimaryParticle()->GetUserInformation();
00063             if (primaryInfo != NULL) {
00064                 traj->setGenStatus(((UserPrimaryParticleInformation*) primaryInfo)->getHepEvtStatus());
00065             }
00066         }
00067 
00068         // Map track ID to trajectory.
00069         trackMap_.addTrajectory(traj);
00070     }
00071 
00072     void UserTrackingAction::processTrack(const G4Track* aTrack) {
00073 
00074         // Set user track info on new track.
00075         if (!aTrack->GetUserInformation()) {
00076             auto trackInfo = new UserTrackInformation;
00077             trackInfo->setInitialMomentum(aTrack->GetMomentum());
00078             const_cast<G4Track*>(aTrack)->SetUserInformation(trackInfo);
00079         }
00080 
00081         // Check if trajectory storage should be turned on or off from the region info.
00082         UserRegionInformation* regionInfo = (UserRegionInformation*) aTrack->GetLogicalVolumeAtVertex()->GetRegion()->GetUserInformation();
00083 
00084         if (regionInfo && !regionInfo->getStoreSecondaries()) {
00085             // Turn off trajectory storage for this track from region flag.
00086             fpTrackingManager->SetStoreTrajectory(false);
00087         } else {
00088             // Store a new trajectory for this track.
00089             storeTrajectory(aTrack);
00090         }
00091 
00092         // Save the association between track ID and its parent ID for all tracks in the event.
00093         trackMap_.addSecondary(aTrack->GetTrackID(), aTrack->GetParentID());
00094     }
00095 }
